quest.name: A Ten-year Promise
objectives: Synthesize a set of writing utensils Deliver the set of writing utensils to the cocksure student.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Last we met, I mentioned there was something I needed to confirm before proceeding. This something concerned Jeromere.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Since joining the Studium, I have not had the chance to have a proper discussion with him.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: There is so much I would like to ask him, such as why he refuses to speak of our vow from ten years ago or why he insists so fervently that I drop my studies.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: For the longest time I was too scared to confront him. I thought if he had truly lost interest in astronomy maybe we wouldn't have anything in common anymore, and...

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Never mind. That's no longer relevant. Thanks to you and our starlens journey, I've become confident enough to face my fears head-on.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: I plan to meet Jeromere and ask him what happened to the promise we made at the exact spot where we encountered the Azure Star in Tranquility.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: But I'm positive that if I ask him to come, Jeromere will find another clever excuse to avoid me.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Please, Forename, would you be so kind as to ask him in my stead?

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Thank you! You can likely find him at Auk's Landing reciting poetry with his friends.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: In the meantime I will make my way to Tranquility and wait for you and Jeromere there.

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: You there! You're the craftswomanman helping out at the Faculty of Astronomy. I take it you're not here to recite poetry?

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: You're looking for Jeromere? Sure, I can point you in his direction but you have to do something for me first.

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: You see, there is this girl. She spurned my advances a few days ago...

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: Hm, I can see you are also flabbergasted to learn she rejected a dashing young man such as myself!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: So what do you need me to do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Hurry up and tell me what you want already.

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: Aren't we snappy? Well, I know just the thing that will elevate me from simply charming to outstanding─a set of classy writing utensils! I want you to craft them for me.

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: I will, of course, see that you are furnished with everything you need. After all, such consideration is the defining quality of a gentleman!

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: Just ask this boy right next to me for materials. He still owes me a rather large sum of gold and will see that all your expenses are covered.

dialogue.name: SURROUNDINGS04143
dialogue.text: Let's hurry and get this over with. I cannot stand being indebted to him for a moment longer!

dialogue.name: SURROUNDINGS04143
dialogue.text: Hm? Who are you? What do you want from us?

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: Once you finish crafting me my utensils, you can deliver them directly to me.

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: Excellent! With this exquisite set, I will no doubt be able to produce poetry beyond that of the average club member! She will have no choice but rethink her foolish decision!

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: Ah, right. You wanted to know where Jeromere is. You can find him at Scholar's Harbor right about this time.

dialogue.name: SURROUNDINGS04143
dialogue.text: A real wet blanket, this one is, if you ask me.

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: No need to say that. He's only just joined and has yet to settle in, is all.

dialogue.name: SURROUNDINGS04143
dialogue.text: What faculty did he transfer over from again?

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: He is certainly not going to be happy if I told you. You're going to have to ask someone else.

dialogue.name: SURROUNDINGS04143
dialogue.text: Hm... Sounds to me like he's harboring a few secrets, then.

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: Yes, yes, the utensils you crafted are superb. Rather than dallying about admiring your handiwork, however, you'd best hurry to Scholar's Harbor if you want to catch Jeromere.

dialogue.name: SURROUNDINGS04143
dialogue.text: Let me know if you need any more materials. <sigh> I should've found a way to return him his gil sooner...

dialogue.name: SURROUNDINGS04143
dialogue.text: Well, at the very least, I've managed to avoid bankruptcy...

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Oh! It's you─the craftswomanman working with Jude. What can I do for you?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I want to talk to you about Jude.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I need to speak with you.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: You want to speak with me regarding Jude...?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Very well. I suppose I can spare a few moments if it concerns our dear friend Jude.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Shall we talk here, or did you wish to speak in private elsewhere?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Tranquility? I'll be on my way, then.

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04143
dialogue.text: Do not worry! They are in good hands. Now, I suggest you hurry. Jeromere isn't going to be at Scholar's Harbor for much longer.

dialogue.name: SURROUNDINGS04143
dialogue.text: The mystery grows deeper. I wonder what happened to Jeromere at his previous faculty...?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: So what exactly did you wish to speak with me about?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: I see... I suspected as much.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Of course I should've known you'd be suspicious. You have always been two steps ahead of me.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Even so, you still came. And I have words for you that have been left unsaid for far too long.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Jeromere, why did you quit the Faculty of Astronomy?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: So you know I once presided there...

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: It would be odd if I didn't. Surely, even you knew you wouldn't be able to feign ignorance for long. I ask you again: why did you quit the Faculty of Astronomy?

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Ten years ago we made a vow at this very spot. We swore together we'd search for and find the Azure Star together!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Why would you renege on our promise now? Have you come to hate astronomy?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Me? Hate astronomy? Ha! Please do not be silly. Finding that star meant the world to me.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: <sigh> You will also be forced to face the truth one day, just as I have. Allow me to warn you before it is too late.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: I am but one summer older than you. I shed blood, sweat, and tears to ensure I'd be able to earn a place to study at the Studium.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: I kept silent about which faculty I was to enter because I had hoped to make some progress toward our goals and surprise you with it once you joined.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Upon hearing members were free to use the telescope any time, I joined the Classical Astronomical Association. I planned to devote all my spare time to our investigation.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: For several months, day in and day out, I took that telescope and observed every last corner of the sky without fail.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: To my utter despair, I was unsuccessful in ever locating the Azure Star.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Even so, I refused to give up on our dream. I thought perhaps a more powerful telescope was required, and so after much negotiating with my professors, I was granted leave to use the finest equipment available in the Studium.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Yet for all my effort, all my planning...I could find not so much as a glimmer of that bloody star in the night sky.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: I grew more weary by the day and was eventually forced to come to a harrowing realization...

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: The Azure Star does not exist. It never did. Just as the scholars at the Studium told us back then, we imagined it.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: The Azure Star...doesn't exist?

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: If...If, in fact, what you say is true, then why not tell me sooner?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Same as me, finding that star meant everything to you. How could I possibly tell you that...

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: If the Azure Star doesn't exist, then what have I been working towards this entire time...?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: I understand your feelings better than you know. Forgetting about it will take time, but it can be done.

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Promise me, however, you won't forget this, Jude: I am and always will be your friend and ally.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: My life─without the Azure Star giving me direction and purpose─is meaningless. What am I to do...?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: What do you want to do?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: You're the only one who can give your life purpose.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Yes. You're absolutely right. Letting someone or something determine my life's path is the easy way out. I'm the only one that can decide what's right for me.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Let's return to Makers' Meet. There is something I would like to investigate.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: If even Jeromere was unable to find it, there is a good chance the Azure Star truly does not exist...

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: There is, however, one other possibility. There is the chance it is out there, just not observable with the tools that were at his disposal.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: The journey we're about to embark upon is about as dark and uncertain as a flight through a starless night sky.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Regardless, I shall not give up. This is a dream I've pursued for a decade. I cannot walk away without a fight.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Alone, I would have no hope of continuing Jeromere's work, but with you by my side perhaps I can accomplish that which even he has not! Forename, may I count on your continued assistance?

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I will see you through your adventure.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Well, I can't leave you to your own devices, can I?

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: I knew I could count on you! Thank you, Forename! Once I have everything sorted, let us begin production posthaste!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: HerHis continued encouragement has really lit a fire in my heart. I feel as fierce as a bomb!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next request will be available from Jude upon reaching level 88 as a carpenter, leatherworker, or weaver.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
